spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortions. The 3D render fails to capture the complex interior geometry of the central hallway, utility room, and kitchen. The stairwell (UP) is entirely missing or misinterpreted as a generic room. Window placements on the bottom and right facades do not match the specific bay window and opening patterns shown in the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the model is correctly isolated on a neutral background with the roof removed, it fails to represent the actual rooms of the floor plan. The internal wall logic is hallucinated, creating a generic apartment layout rather than following the blueprint's utility and dining room divisions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Missing critical permanent fixtures from the plan including the kitchen counters/sink, the specific WC vanity, and the utility room appliances. Hallucinated beds and generic blocks are placed in areas not corresponding to the blueprint's requirements.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to the visual style. The render is low-poly, utilizes flat shading with soft ambient light, and uses an appropriate isometric orthographic camera angle. No textures or photorealistic elements are present.

detected_errors.description: Missing specific kitchen cabinetry and the central stairwell structural core.
Incorrect wall alignment; the dining room and utility room partition does not match the dimensions in the plan.
Hallucinated generic bedroom furniture where the plan indicates a dining area and central hall.
The faceted bay window (window seat) on the right side of the plan is rendered as a flat wall with standard windows.
